summary.span: 用作 控件的根类。

span.span: Serves as the root class of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类公开的所有属性、 方法和图表 Windows 控件的事件。This class exposes all of the properties, methods and events of the Chart Windows control. 两个重要属性类和属性，这两种是集合属性。Two important properties of the class are the and properties, both of which are collection properties. 集合属性存储对象，用于存储是与该数据的属性一起显示的数据。The collection property stores objects, which are used to store data that is to be displayed, along with attributes of that data. 集合属性存储主要用于绘制一个或多个图表使用一组轴的对象。The collection property stores objects, which are primarily used to draw one or more charts using one set of axes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以使用此构造函数创建的新实例在运行时类。You can use this constructor to create a new instance of the class at run time. 但是，为了简单起见，建议你创建在设计时的实例。However, for simplicity, it is recommended that you create a instance at design time. 这是根对象的控件。This is the root object of the control.

param.span: 逗号分隔的系列列表，这些系列的数据点使用数据点轴标签沿 X 轴排列。

summary.span: 使用升序排序顺序排列图表中的指定系列。

span.span: The specified series in the chart are aligned using an ascending sort order.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法用于对齐沿 X 轴使用的轴标签，不同系列中的数据点，并且是适用：This method is used to align data points from different series along the X axis using their axis labels, and is applicable when: - 多个序列的显示，并且编制索引;这就是，所有数据点都具有0，或属性是`true`。Multiple series are displayed and are indexed; that is, all data points have an of 0, or the property is `true`. - 所有数据点都具有非空轴标签，它们是唯一的其。All data points have non-empty axis labels, which are unique to their . 如果它们不是唯一的则将引发异常。If they are not unique, an exception will be thrown. 在创建多个系列会导致数据绑定时，这种情况下是很常见和`string`值用于 x 轴值。This situation is very common when data-binding results in the creation of multiple series, and `string` values are used for X-axis values. 当多个索引时，会出现两个问题系列的绘制，并且使用设置 X 值`string`值：Two issues arise when multiple, indexed series are plotted, and the X-values are set using `string` values: - 不能保证，将在同一索引沿 X 轴绘制不同系列中具有相同的字符串 X 值的数据点。It cannot be guaranteed that data points from different series with the same string X-values will be plotted at the same index along the X axis. - 将显示仅第一个序列中的数据点的轴标签，即使其他系列中具有相同的索引的数据点太具有轴标签。Only the axis label for the data points in the first series will be displayed, even though data points from other series with the same index have axis labels too. 默认情况下，在其序列中的存储的顺序绘制的点。By default, points are plotted in the order in which they are stored in their series. 若要指定排序顺序，请使用`AlignDataPointsByAxisLabel`具有方法重载`sortingOrder`参数。To specify a sort order, use an `AlignDataPointsByAxisLabel` method overload that has a `sortingOrder` parameter.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值决定绘制文本和图形时是否使用抗锯齿功能。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that determines whether anti-aliasing is used when text and graphics are drawn.

value.span: 一个 枚举值，该值决定绘制文本和图形时是否使用抗锯齿功能。

span.span: An enumeration value that determines whether anti-aliasing is used when text and graphics are drawn.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 抗锯齿来"粗糙边缘"平滑通过填充像素而中间颜色和对于整理的图表的未绘制为矩形的边缘特别有效。Anti-aliasing smoothens out "jagged edges" by padding pixels with intermediate colors, and is especially effective for smoothing out edges for charts that are not drawn as rectangles. 例如，抗锯齿折线图和饼图中，对于非常有效，但不是为适合条形图和柱形图。For example, anti-aliasing is very effective for line charts and pie charts, but is not as effective for bar and column charts. 抗锯齿可以应用于如矩形、 圆形和等的文本和/或图形基元。Anti-aliasing can be applied to text and/or graphics primitives such as rectangles, circles, and so forth. 请注意该抗锯齿将影响性能。Note that anti-aliasing will affect performance.

summary.span: 设置自动分配的系列和数据点颜色，以允许在运行时以编程方式进行访问。

span.span: Sets the automatically assigned series and data point colors, to allow programmatic access at run time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当颜色自动分配在运行时，将没有办法知道当图表呈现; 在时间之前，颜色将是什么`Color`自动分配的值的属性将返回在此时间。When the colors are automatically assigned at run time, there is no way to know what the colors will be prior to the time when the chart rendered; the `Color` property of an automatically assigned value will return at this time. 如果调用方法，序列和数据点的颜色将设置，它允许以编程方式访问。If you call the method, the colors for the series and the data points will be set, which allows for programmatic access.

value.span: 默认颜色为 。

span.span: The default color is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以将此属性设置为任何有效的 ARGB alpha、 红色、 绿色 (蓝色） 值。You can set this property to any valid ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value. 请注意，对于对象，无法将 alpha 分量设置为 255 以外的值。Note that for the object, the alpha component cannot be set to a value other than 255. 这还意味着，对于仅，对象值不能使用。This also means that, for the object only, a value cannot be used. 值将是如果你正在使用的背景的渐变颜色使用的第一个颜色。The value will be the first color used if you are using gradient colors for the background. Alpha 值控制一种颜色的不的透明度。The alpha value controls the opacity of a color. 如果将此颜色设置为"透明"— 也就是说，如果你使用的 alpha 值为 0-无颜色将分配给标题的背景。If you set this color to "transparent"—that is, if you use an alpha value of 0—no color will be assigned to the background of the title. 因此，背景将呈透明。As a result, the background will be transparent.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性定义的背景图像路径图例中，可以是绝对或相对 URL。This property defines a path to a background image for a legend, and can be an absolute or relative URL. 若要定位图像，请使用和属性。To position the image, use the and properties. 你还可以指定通过设置为"透明"的映像显示的颜色之一属性。You can also specify one of the colors displayed by the image as "transparent", by setting the property. 映像可以来源于支持.NET Framework，包括图标的任何有效图形文件。An image can originate from any valid graphics file supported by .NET Framework, including icons. 背景图像优先于其他后台属性，如渐变颜色。Background images take precedence over other background properties such as gradient color.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性确定图像的显示方式，例如，平铺、 缩放后，等等。This property determines how the image is displayed, for example, tiled, scaled, and so forth. 如果缩放图像，它将拉伸以适合该图表的边界。If an image is scaled, it will be stretched to fit within the bounds of the chart. 如果平铺图像，则从图表左上角开始，对其重复绘制。If the image is tiled, it is repeatedly drawn, starting from the top-left corner of the chart. 有关可用包装模式的详细信息，请参阅枚举主题。For more information about the available wrapping modes, see the enumeration topic. 如果属性设置为，绘制图像的位置由属性设置。If the property is set to , the location where the image is drawn is determined by the property setting.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果你想要从流，如内存流、 文件流和等加载模板，请使用此方法。Use this method if you want to load a template from a stream, such as a memory stream, file stream, and so forth. 请确保设置属性`true`保存模板的模板之前方法。Make sure to set the property to `true` before saving the template with the method. 如果加载的模板有两个数据序列，该系列的外观属性将按顺序应用到图表。If a loaded template has two data series, the appearance properties of the series are applied sequentially to the chart. 换而言之，第一个模板序列外观属性赋予图表的第一个系列，第二个模板序列外观属性适用于在该图中，第二个序列，然后对于第三个再次使用第一个模板序列系列的图中，依次类推。In other words, the first template series appearance properties are assigned to the first series of the chart, the second template series appearance properties are applied to the second series of the chart, then the first template series is used again for the third series of the chart, and so on. 对于如此图表区和外观属性的任何其他集合。The same holds true for chart areas, and any other collections that have appearance properties. 模板可以用于模拟自定义调色板。Templates can be used to simulate custom palettes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `name`参数必须使用完整路径，例如，C:\MyPic.jpg。The `name` parameter must use a full path, for example, C:\MyPic.jpg. 请注意，你必须指定文件扩展名。Note that you must also specify the file extension. 此方法将从已保存使用的磁盘中加载模板方法。This method loads a template from disk that was saved using the method. 请确保设置属性`true`保存模板的模板之前方法。Make sure to set the property to `true` before saving the template with the method. 如果加载的模板有两个数据序列，该系列的外观属性将按顺序应用到图表。If a loaded template has two data series, the appearance properties of the series are applied sequentially to the chart. 换而言之，第一个模板序列外观属性赋予图表的第一个系列，第二个模板序列外观属性适用于在该图中，第二个序列，然后对于第三个再次使用第一个模板序列系列的图中，依次类推。In other words, the first template series appearance properties are assigned to the first series of the chart, the second template series appearance properties are applied to the second series of the chart, then the first template series is used again for the third series of the chart, and so on. 对于如此图表区和外观属性的任何其他集合。The same holds true for chart areas, and any other collections that have appearance properties. 模板可以用于模拟自定义调色板。Templates can be used to simulate custom palettes.

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.Editor("System.Windows.Forms.Design.DataVisualization.Charting.ColorPaletteEditor, System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Design, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=31bf3856ad364e35", "System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor, System.Drawing, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

summary.span: 获取或设置 控件的调色板。

span.span: Gets or sets the palette for the control.

value.span: 一个 枚举值，该值决定了要使用的调色板。

span.span: A enumeration value that determines the palette to be used.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调色板用于自动将颜色分配给数据元素，如果两个以下条件均已满足：A palette is used to automatically assign colors to data elements if both of the following conditions have been met: - 数据点本身不具有分配给他们的颜色。the data points themselves do not have colors assigned to them. - 数据序列数据点属于还没有分配的颜色。the data series that the data points belong to also does not have an assigned color. 如果未显式不指定任何序列或数据点颜色，使用的颜色取决于图表类型与对象的调色板或一系列关联，如果指定了一个调色板。If no series or data point colors are explicitly specified, the colors used depend on the chart type and the object's palette or the palette of an associated series, if one is specified. > [!NOTE] > 如果`Palette`属性同时和对象设置为，和为相关的数据序列或数据点分配任何颜色，数据点将不绘制，并将显示为"空"区域。If the `Palette` property for both the and objects is set to , and no color is assigned to the relevant data series or data points, the data points will not be drawn, and will be displayed as "empty" areas.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property cli::array <System::Drawing::Color> ^ PaletteCustomColors { cli::array <System::Drawing::Color> ^ get(); void set(cli::array <System::Drawing::Color> ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置自定义调色板颜色的数组。

span.span: Gets or sets an array of custom palette colors.

value.span: 对象的数组，这些对象表示图表上的系列使用的颜色集。

span.span: An array of objects that represent the set of colors used for series on the chart.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果你需要多个 16 种颜色，或你想要向图表应用您自己的颜色，则必须定义自定义调色板。If you need more than 16 colors or you want to apply your own colors to the chart, you must define a custom palette. 自定义调色板，可以在你想要在图表中显示的顺序中添加您自己的颜色。A custom palette let you add your own colors in the order you want them to appear on the chart. 这种类型的调色板将特别有用，如果在设计时在图表中的序列数目是未知。This type of palette is especially helpful if the number of series in your chart is unknown at design time. 此属性未包含任何时生效属性是*不*设置为This property has no effect when the property is *not* set to 。.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当打印图表时，将打印滚动条除外的所有图表元素。When a chart is printed, all chart elements except scrollbars will be printed. 对象包含以下方法，用于打印的基本操作：The object contains the following methods, which are used for basic printing operations: ： 显示页面设置对话框中，它允许最终用户选择的纸张大小、 纸张来源、 页面方向和等。: Displays a Page Setup dialog, which allows the end-user to select paper size, paper source, page orientation, and so forth. ： 显示打印预览对话框中，它允许最终用户可缩放、 打印图表，和等等。: Displays a Print Preview dialog, which allows the end-user to zoom, print the chart, and so forth. ： 将打印; （可选） 可以在打印之前显示打印对话框。: Prints the ; the Print dialog can optionally be displayed prior to printing.

span.span: if non-critical exceptions should be suppressed; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果将此属性设置为`true`，将取消显示非关键异常。If you set this property to `true`, non-critical exceptions will be suppressed. 当控件无法正确绘制图表使用的数据和提供其他设置，将引发异常。When the control cannot properly plot the chart using the data and other settings provided, an exception will be thrown. 虽然显示异常在应用程序测试期间很有用，它们应时不会显示在发布应用程序。Although displaying exceptions is useful during application testing, they should not be shown when the application is released. > [!NOTE] > 此属性设置为`true`可能隐藏用户应用程序源代码中的严重问题。Setting this property to `true` may hide serious issues in the user application source code. 此设置还可能会导致图表图像生成可能会误报你的数据。This setting could also cause a chart image to be generated that might misrepresent your data. 强烈建议将此模式，仅用于的发布版本。It is highly recommended that this mode be only used in Release builds.
